messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1474
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/15/01 12:53:33 PM Mountain Daylight Time, ... I didn t say your thoughts weren t welcome here.  I asked what you were hoping to gain being
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/15/01 12:53:33 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
rumpleteasermom@... writes:


> >This list was never intended to be the front room through which new
> >unschoolers come to know unschooling. The forum is the "real" place.
> >
> >Sandra
>
> But Sandra, last week you (at least I think it was you) told me that my
> thoughts weren't welcome here because they were not pure unschooling and
> if someone was here for 'real unschooling' advice they might get
> confused.
>

I didn't say your thoughts weren't welcome here. I asked what you were
hoping to gain being here. That's not the same thing. And I didn't really
get an answer, but it doesn't really matter.

IF someone comes here I often recommend they go to unschooling.com. You
received that same advice, from me and from others.

Coming to this list for intro advice is not ideal. It's even LESS ideal if
other types of advice are being offered without question by others here.

Can we talk about unschooling now instead of the list itself please?

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1474
messages.msgSnippet: ... But Sandra, last week you (at least I think it was you) told me that my thoughts weren t welcome here because they were not pure unschooling and if someone
messages.messageBody:
>This list was never intended to be the front room through which new
>unschoolers come to know unschooling. The forum is the "real" place.
>
>Sandra

But Sandra, last week you (at least I think it was you) told me that my
thoughts weren't welcome here because they were not pure unschooling and
if someone was here for 'real unschooling' advice they might get
confused.

Bridget

ps - you need to look at who I am talking to before you claim I am
misattributing words to you. I was speaking TO brenda so the 'you' in
that post refered to her.

~~~~~~~~~~~~ F u cn rd ths u cnt spl wrth a dm! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

If electricity comes from electrons . . .
. . . does that mean that morality comes from morons?
